commentList.translatedContent: It's too embarrassing. Outsiders don't call the hotel to ask about nucleic acid and travel in Beijing. It's too embarrassing! Called in advance to ask if the non-local car can drive to the hotel, because the hotel is located within the 2nd ring road, I heard that the non-local car cannot enter, but the hotel replied that the Beijing entry permit can enter! As a result, after applying for the Beijing Entry Permit, we still could not enter. We were stopped by the traffic police as soon as we entered the Second Ring Road. We could only park the car in the toll parking lot outside the Second Ring Road, and then took a taxi to the hotel! ! I also asked the hotel for nucleic acid testing, and said that it will be tested 24 hours a day. After the result arrived, I realized that it could not be tested after 9 pm! If you don't know, then answer if you don't know. Don't give out-of-towners completely wrong information. It's really expensive and time-consuming and makes people very angry! !

I went to see Rumeng and decided on this hotel. The location is super good. It is Nanluogu Alley and next to the subway station. It is very convenient to go to Tofuchi Hutong, Ya'er Hutong or Shichahai, Forbidden City, Tiananmen Square, and it is very convenient during the day and night. Quiet, you can feel the morning in Beijing Hutong by opening the curtains. I like the style of the hotel very much, the door is warm, and the cold is immediately isolated from the outside. The black and white room style is simple and generous. The lights, curtains and heating are automatically turned on without inserting a room card. The meals are delicious in the morning and evening. The hotel staff are very kind and solve problems as soon as possible. In the end, Xiao Xiaoâ€™s flower wall was very beautiful, and I couldnâ€™t help but take pictures every time I passed by. The sunflowers were growing towards the sun, the coffee they sent was delicious, I also gave me postcards, and the small gifts in the room were also super favorite. I am very happy to have a very comfortable living environment while making me feel like a dream.

This time I went to Beijing to watch a drama like a dream. I booked this hotel in cooperation with Sumidagawa Coffee, endorsed by Xiao Zhan. After staying in the hotel, the front desk welcomed guests very warmly. Although the room is not big, it is clean and tidy. The mattress in his house is very comfortable to sleep on, and the quality of bathroom products is also very good. Water and drinks are free to drink. It is very close to the subway entrance and the transportation is very convenient. Special thanks to Sumidagawa Coffee, a cup of coffee a day, and free breakfast are really sweet, refill!

commentList.translatedContent: Personally think this hotel is really worth recommending, the service is very good. The setting is also very good. The air conditioner is not easy to use in the middle, so I changed the room directly, and the drinks in the room are free. . . Hahaha

Except the room is a little small, everything else is good. The decoration is good, the service is good, the location is good, the subway exit is 2 minutes away, and there is a robot meal delivery service. It is the first time to see a robot applied in a hotel. It is very novel and very convenient. After three nights, I was very satisfied, and I didn't expect that the room also provided Coke at this price. The breakfast was canceled due to the epidemic, and it was packaged and delivered to the room. The portion is also large, and I am satisfied.

The location is good, in the center of Beijing, the subway entrance, it is very convenient to go anywhere. Service and hygiene are also great. The facilities are complete and the sound insulation is good. When I stayed, I didn't hear the sound of other rooms or the road.

I have lived many times, and this time something happened, so I will evaluate it truthfully. Within a few minutes of check-in, I heard the cleaning door knock on the door one by one asking if it is convenient to disinfect. When I knocked on my place, I just responded that I would open my door privately after a while. I probed my head and asked again if I could come in for disinfection. What can I do, so a man came in and sprayed something and left. I am staying alone, and this kind of behavior makes people feel very bad. I open the female guest's room without permission, and I only open my room without brushing other people's rooms. I don't know whether to treat differently or to verify whether it is true of a person staying alone, unable to understand this out-of-bounds behavior. Will not come again for safety reasons. This is a very serious violation in the hotel industry. I hope businesses can standardize the work process of cleaning staff, and disinfection should not be carried out after check-in.

commentList.translatedContent: It takes less than 5 minutes to walk to the subway entrance, next to the Nanluoguxiang archway, surrounded by alleys with strange names, you can stroll around very close, and you can also ride a bicycle to Jingshan Park and Beihai Park.

Close to the subway entrance, close to South Tongluogu Lane, the location is great! The room is small, after all, it is the core area, after all, it was remodeled from the old house in the past, but the design style is very much! The most important point is to give this hotel a big praise. Ctrip has already paid the booking fee. When I arrived at the hotel, maybe the waiter was a newcomer, and I paid the room fee again. After more than a month, I forgot it. In this matter, Ctrip and the hotel have called me several times, so the overpaid room fee was refunded the same way! Like the integrity of the hotel and Ctrip! There is no breakfast in the hotel, there are many bun shops not far away, and there are many shared bicycles in front of the hotel. It is also unique to ride a bicycle to tour Beijing! Please be assured that the store staff are vaccinated and registered with body temperature twice a day. It is very convenient whether you take a taxi or take the bus and subway; in addition, the surrounding attractions are also very many very many. Nearly, Nanluoguxiang, Houhai, Shichahai, and Gulou Street can be reached in ten minutes on foot, and it takes only ten minutes by car or subway to go to Prince Gongâ€™s Mansion, Wangfujing, and Jingshan Park. It is very convenient to travel and play; we will also Continue to work hard to create more and better staying experiences and look forward to your every stay.

commentList.translatedContent:
The location is very good, next to Nanluoguxiang, within 100 meters from the subway station. The breakfast provided by the members was good.
The room is very small, there is no place to read a book or put a computer, the sink is in the room, and the shower and toilet are small and glass, which makes living inconvenient.

The environment is very good, the service is very good, located in the city center, very close to the subway station, it is very convenient to go everywhere! The hotel rooms are well-equipped, clean and sanitary, and the price is moderate, very good choice

It is really rare to be in a location like Nanluo! The room has its own characteristics. It is the first time I feel the brand of CityGo and I have a good impression. There is red jujube barley water in the lobby, although the front desk did not take the initiative to greet me, I still poured it myself.

Very good hotel! The subway is up there, parking in the courtyard, smart facilities, electric curtains, sensor lights in the bathroom, mobile phone holders and night lights at the bedside, and robots delivering breakfast to the room are all very user-friendly. The slight shortcoming is that the bottled water is two small bottles. Although I stayed alone, I felt that it was not enough to drink.

The room is very small, just a big bed, some luggage, the price is not bad in Beijing, the location is super good, just go out to the subway station, there is a very high-end western restaurant inside, it is easy to say that I went to eat on the day I left, really Canâ€™t catch up, there are many nearby attractions, Shishahai and Prince Gongâ€™s Mansion are very close, the lamb skewers of Nanmen Barbecue I really want to eat it.

The service is considerate and interesting. No dine-in breakfast was provided during the epidemic. Went early and arranged for me to upgrade in advance. The whole is small and beautiful, the bedding is particularly comfortable, and you fall asleep in seconds! ğŸ„I gave out an apple on Christmas EveğŸ

ratingCalculationInfo.title: How ratings are calculated
ratingCalculationInfo.content: To ensure the authenticity of the ratings that are displayed, we don't simply calculate an average. Instead, we make scientific calculations based on the review credibility and the freshness of the guest's experience to get the final rating.
